translation.en: [woman] Things need to change and change now.
[man] Which is why we are staging a protest at the Democratic National Convention.
translation.de: Deshalb veranstalten wir einen Protest bei dem Parteitag der Demokraten.

translation.en: [man 2] And the Republicans are any better?
-We plan on challenging them as well. -[distant phone ringing]
So you want me to lead 5,000 Negroes into Los Angeles
translation.de: Ich soll also 5.000 Schwarze nach Los Angeles führen

translation.en: and disrupt the Democratic Convention?
translation.de: und den Parteitag der Demokraten stören?

translation.en: I'm sorry. I'm not your man.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, ich bin nicht Ihr Mann.

translation.en: Who told you you are not our man?
translation.de: Wer hat gesagt, du wärst nicht unser Mann?

translation.en: Were you not our man
when you took command of the Montgomery bus boycott
or spoke with such eloquence the night your home was bombed?
translation.de: oder nach dem Anschlag auf dein Haus?

translation.en: You're conveniently forgetting I'm now co-pastor of Ebenezer.
translation.de: Ich bin jetzt zweiter Pastor in der Ebenezer.

translation.en: When C.L. first heard you speak, he rang me and said,
translation.de: Als C.L. dich reden hörte, rief er mich an und sagte:

translation.en: "Bayard, there's magic going on down here."
You know what he saw? A star.
translation.de: Weißt du, wen er sah? Einen Star.

translation.en: And when that star starts to shine brighter than any other,
translation.de: Und wenn dieser Star heller strahlt als alle anderen,

translation.en: including the most powerful Negro leaders that came before,
translation.de: darunter die mächtigsten Schwarzen Anführer, die vor ihm kamen,

translation.en: they will do everything in their power
to extinguish your light and put you in your place.
translation.de: um dein Licht auszulöschen und dich unten zu halten.

translation.en: Mrs. Ella Baker, I have received a number of calls
translation.de: Mrs. Ella Baker, führende Männer innerhalb der Bewegung

translation.en: from prominent men within the movement who see no wisdom in these protests.
translation.de: Mrs. Ella Baker, führende Männer innerhalb der Bewegung sehen keinen Sinn in diesen Protesten.

translation.en: Men with whom I share a strong kinship.
translation.de: Männer, mit denen mich viel verbindet.

translation.en: Not once you leave the room.
translation.de: Nicht, sobald Sie den Raum verlassen.

translation.en: [softly] Friend, one of my greatest joys is watching you rise.
translation.de: Es ist meine größte Freude, dich aufsteigen zu sehen.

translation.en: We need you to lead us into Los Angeles,
translation.de: Du musst uns nach Los Angeles führen,

translation.en: where we will most vigorously let Kennedy and the entire Democratic Party know
translation.de: wo wir Kennedy und die Demokraten wissen lassen werden,

translation.en: that unless they show up for our people,
translation.de: dass, wenn sie uns nicht helfen,

translation.en: take a stand against segregation, our people will not show up for them.
translation.de: die Rassentrennung zu bekämpfen, wir ihnen nicht helfen.

translation.en: -Hear! Hear! -Yes! Yes! Yes!
[Bayard] Do this, Martin.
Own your power.
I am pleased to announce
that my friend, Dr. Martin Luther King, will be joining us in Los Angeles.
translation.de: dass mein Freund Dr. Martin Luther King in Los Angeles mitmarschieren wird.

translation.en: -Yes! -Yes!
I'm telling you, the best grits ever.
Lest I remind you, I was born and raised in Georgia. My mother was--
translation.de: Mein Freund, ich komme aus Georgia. Meine Mutter…

translation.en: Try them.
-How's my beloved Coretta? -Fine.
-And the kids? -Missing you.
Every time I step through that house, "How's Uncle Bayard?"
translation.de: Ständig heißt es: "Wie geht's Onkel Bayard?"

translation.en: -Aw. [chuckles] -"Where's Uncle Bayard?"
And those self-appointed noble Negroes of the NAACP?
translation.de: Und diese selbst ernannten Heiligen von der NAACP?

translation.en: I can't wait to hear what they have to say about us making a move on LA.
translation.de: Ich bin gespannt, was sie über unseren Marsch nach LA sagen.

translation.en: My convention, my party.
I've spent the past 15 years fighting Dixiecrats in Congress,
translation.de: Seit 15 Jahren kämpfe ich gegen die Dixiekraten

translation.en: going after and winning on everything from poll taxes
translation.de: um alles, angefangen bei der Wahlsteuer

translation.en: to the right to piss in the goddamn Congressional commode.
translation.de: bis hin zum Pissrecht in der Kongresstoilette.

translation.en: How dare his Black ass take aim without first coming to me?
translation.de: Und er greift an, ohne vorher zu mir zu kommen?

translation.en: [man] Had King reached out, would you have said yes?
Hell, no. That fighting son of a bitch needs to keep down South where he belongs.
translation.de: Nein. Der aufsässige Mistkerl soll im Süden bleiben, wo er hingehört.

translation.en: I blame Rustin.
Ever since the Montgomery bus boycott, he's got King thinking he's the second coming.
translation.de: Seit dem Busboykott redet er King ein, er sei der Messias.

translation.en: The hell with Bayard Rustin.
His attention-grabbing antics are the exact opposite
translation.de: Er ist zu schrill, so werden keine Gesetze geändert.

translation.en: of how policy is altered and laws are changed.
translation.de: Er ist zu schrill, so werden keine Gesetze geändert. NAACP-GESCHÄFTSFÜHRER

translation.en: [softly] And let's not mention the unmentionable.
translation.de: Von dem Unsagbaren ganz zu schweigen.

translation.en: [Powell] No.
I say, say it.
Say it, I say, and say it loud!
translation.de: Sag es, und sag es laut.

translation.en: Listen to me.
I am phoning the good reverend doctor's office today.
translation.de: Ich rufe noch heute das Büro des guten Reverends an.

translation.en: If they don't call this shit off,
translation.de: Blasen sie die Scheiße nicht ab,

translation.en: the world will know the truth about Martin Luther King and his queen.
translation.de: wird die ganze Welt von Martin Luther King und seiner Queen erfahren.

translation.en: And, baby, I do not mean Coretta.
translation.de: Und ich meine damit nicht Coretta.

translation.en: Congressman Powell has done so much for Harlem.
translation.de: Abgeordneter Powell hat sehr viel für Harlem getan.

translation.en: Almost as much as he's done for himself.
translation.de: GEWERKSCHAFTSORGANISATOR Beinahe so viel wie für sich selbst.

translation.en: But this is a bold-faced lie, and he knows it.
translation.de: Aber das ist eine glatte Lüge, und das weiß er.

translation.en: [man] I have to tell Martin. I have--
translation.de: Ich muss es Martin sagen. Ich…

translation.en: Yes, I'm well aware of the fact
that Martin is your boss as well as your friend,
translation.de: dass Martin Ihr Vorgesetzter und Freund ist.

translation.en: but at least let me speak with Bayard first,
translation.de: Aber lassen Sie mich mit Bayard sprechen,

translation.en: as this is certain to disorder his soul most of all!
translation.de: denn das wird seine Seele am meisten verletzen!

translation.en: Me and Martin?
[scoffs] No, no, no, no, no, no, no.
Brothers, yes.
Besides, he's not my type.
[Randolph] Making threats, talking about going to the white print--
translation.de: Sie drohen, wollen zur weißen Presse…

translation.en: Chief, Chief, you call it trouble. I call it an opportunity.
translation.de: Chief, Sie sehen ein Problem. Ich sehe eine Gelegenheit.

translation.en: In response to Powell's reckless accusations,
I'll write a letter tendering my resignation.
When Martin rejects it, we will have forced him to see
translation.de: Wenn Martin sie ablehnt, wird er erkannt haben,

translation.en: who wishes him well and who does not.
translation.de: wer sein Bestes will und wer nicht.

translation.en: -[Randolph] What makes you so sure? -Hm.
-Be-- Because I know Martin, sir. -[Randolph] Bayard?
-Sir. -[Randolph] You may know Martin, but--
-All will be fine. -[music stops abruptly]
I assumed it would just be the two of us.
translation.de: Ich dachte, wir würden zu zweit sein.

translation.en: We thank you for your many years of service.
translation.de: Wir danken Ihnen für Ihre treuen Dienste.

translation.en: -[stamping] -[paper rustling] -[metal clanking] -[stamping]
translation.de: ES GIBT KEINEN WEG ZUM FRIEDEN FRIEDEN IST DER WEG

translation.en: -[phone clicks] -[woman] War Resisters League.
Excuse me.
-Hey! My brother. -[man] Blyden.
-What's up, man? -[man] What's up, man? Looking good.
Mm.
Good Lordy, Miss Claudia.
Goodness. I'm just gonna squeeze right through here. [chuckles]
translation.de: Ich will mich nur kurz durchquetschen.

translation.en: I tell you, man, I go south again,
it's gonna be with a gun in my hand and Brother Malcolm in my heart.
translation.de: mit einer Waffe in der Hand und Malcolm im Herzen.

translation.en: Right.
Hey! What's up, man?
[woman] Bayard. Bayard.
"For ne'er I saw a true beauty till this night."
Are you talking to the vodka or me?
translation.de: Redest du von mir oder dem Wodka?

translation.en: I take it there was some sort of protest?
Uh, it kinda got derailed, so we invited everyone back here.
translation.de: Das Ganze ist entgleist, also luden wir alle hierher ein.

translation.en: -Yeah! -[man] Nice.
Obscure fact about Miss Ella Baker,
translation.de: Ein wenig bekannter Fakt über Ella Baker,

translation.en: early champion of SNCC.
She's Al Capone when it comes to cards.
translation.de: Beim Kartenspielen wird sie zu Al Capone.

translation.en: Tonk, Bid Whist, Crazy Eights. [laughs]
You're marvelous and have absolutely no idea who I am.
translation.de: Du bist fabelhaft und hast keine Ahnung, wer ich bin.

translation.en: Like you know what I know?
translation.de: Sie wissen nicht, was ich weiß.

translation.en: [softly] Ice.
Uh, who is that?
Doors barricaded…
tires slashed.
No escape.
Firebombs thrown inside.
Folks started screamin'.
I finally get out.
I'm on the ground.
This white man…
takes this pipe
and hits me…
over and over.
I'm so sorry.
Like we give a shit you sorry.
It's probably one of your uncles or cousins with that pipe.
translation.de: Das war wahrscheinlich ein Onkel von dir.

translation.en: -I was raised in Brooklyn. -Listening to this shit?
-Why would I have cousins in Alabama? -White boy talking shit.
Tom isn't like that.
Bet you these two are card-carrying members
translation.de: Ich wette, die zwei sind Stammgäste

translation.en: of Martin-de-Lawd's nonviolence jamboree.
So let's play. I'll be the redneck.
translation.de: Lass uns spielen. Ich bin der Hinterwäldler.

translation.en: Beat you so bad your body starts to scream.
translation.de: Ich verprügele dich, bis dein Körper schreit.

translation.en: Beat you like they beat Tyrone.
Beat you till you're calling for your mama.
translation.de: Bis du nach deiner Mama schreist.

translation.en: Whoa, hey!
I'm the one that's been preaching passive resistance
translation.de: Ich predige passiven Widerstand schon länger

translation.en: since before you were born.
-So hit me. -Bayard, I can take care of myself.
The pacifist is opposed to using violence, but must be prepared to receive it.
translation.de: Der Pazifist lehnt Gewalt ab, muss jedoch auf sie vorbereitet sein.

translation.en: Only aim left.
A policeman in '42 already took care of the right.
translation.de: Um die rechte hat sich ein Polizist 1942 gekümmert.

translation.en: Symmetry.
I hear when King said "git,"
you tucked your tail between your legs and swished away.
translation.de: bist du mit eingezogenem Schwanz davongetrottet.

translation.en: You're irrelevant.
It's Friday night. I've been called worse.
So, what are you gonna do?
Offering my face as a punching bag to a would-be Sugar Ray wasn't enough?
translation.de: Mein Gesicht hinzuhalten hat nicht gereicht?

translation.en: I am talking about the party.
A party is hors d'oeuvres, laughter, mambo for Latin lovers on the hi-fi.
translation.de: Auf Partys wird gelacht, Mambo getanzt und Hors d'oeuvres gegessen.

translation.en: Earlier today, a fight almost broke out. It did not used to be like that.
translation.de: Vorhin gab es fast eine Schlägerei. Früher war das anders.

translation.en: And now it is like that all the time. SNCC, CORE, the NAACP kids,
translation.de: Jetzt kommt es ständig vor. SNCC, CORE, die NAACP:

translation.en: we're all fighting over agendas and slogans and songs.
translation.de: Wir streiten um Agenden, Slogans und Lieder.

translation.en: -And you know who's winning? -Something tells me I'm about to find out.
Bull Connor in Birmingham, Strom Thurmond on the Senate floor.
translation.de: Bull Connor in Birmingham, Strom Thurmond im Senat.

translation.en: While we all snap and snarl and eat each other alive.
translation.de: Während wir keifen, knurren und einander zerfleischen.

translation.en: -So, what are you gonna do? -I already have a job.
translation.de: Was wirst du tun? Ich habe einen Job.

translation.en: Muste and I have worked together off and on since I was in my twenties.
The man hates you because you possess everything that he does not,
translation.de: Er hasst dich, weil du hast, was er will.

translation.en: charm, passion, a goddamn pulse.
Tom, you've yet to learn it is unwise to speak of that which you do not know.
translation.de: Tom, sprich nicht über Sachen, über die du nichts weißt.

translation.en: Why don't you just admit that you're still upset
translation.de: Gib es zu: Es schmerzt dich,

translation.en: over what happened between you and Dr. King,
translation.de: was mit Dr. King passiert ist,

translation.en: and so you will use any excuse,
including working a job that you hate… -Irrational. -…to avoid a cause that you love?
translation.de: etwa einen Job, den du hasst, um nicht für deine Sache zu kämpfen.

translation.en: You're smart about some things, not about everything.
translation.de: Du verstehst viel, aber nicht alles.

translation.en: I can have an opinion.
And when it comes to my life, my past, especially as it relates to Martin,
translation.de: Wenn es um mein Leben, um meine Vergangenheit mit Martin geht,

translation.en: I have the right to say, "Enough!"
translation.de: kann ich sagen, wann es reicht.

translation.en: Last time I checked, that was illegal.
translation.de: Soweit ich weiß, ist das illegal.

translation.en: Last time I checked, so were we.
translation.de: Soweit ich weiß, sind wir es auch.

translation.en: -I've had an idea. -Hm.
Wanna be my assistant again?
Of course.
Give me the Randolph/Truman '48 folder. In that trunk over there.
translation.de: Gib mir die Randolph/Truman-Akte 1948. In der Kiste dort.

translation.en: Thirty years ago, Gandhi walked to the sea,
translation.de: Vor 30 Jahren stieg Gandhi ins Meer,

translation.en: picked up a handful of salt,
and inspired a movement that brought down an empire.
translation.de: und schuf eine Bewegung, die ein Imperium stürzte.

translation.en: The time has come for us to do the same.
translation.de: Es wird Zeit, dass wir das Gleiche tun.

translation.en: We are going to put together
the largest peaceful protest in the history of this nation.
translation.de: den größten friedlichen Protest in der Geschichte dieses Landes.

translation.en: How big?
One hundred thousand people.
Is he for real?
A massive two-day demonstration
with enough power to shut down the White House and Capitol Hill.
translation.de: die das Weiße Haus und Capitol Hill lahmlegt.

translation.en: Made up of angelic troublemakers such as yourselves,
translation.de: Bestehend aus engelsgleichen Unruhestiftern wie euch,

translation.en: with ideas so bold, so inspiring,
translation.de: voller Ideen, die so inspirierend sind,

translation.en: their execution will demand all groups draw tightly together and become one.
translation.de: dass ihre Durchführung die Zusammenarbeit aller Gruppen erfordert.

translation.en: So, talk, shout, take command!
translation.de: Also redet, brüllt und ergreift das Kommando!

translation.en: What if we flood the offices of every member of the House and Senate
translation.de: Füllen wir die Büros aller Haus- und Senatsmitglieder

translation.en: with delegates of the church, labor, civil rights?
-And-- -And? And?
And such numbers the legislative branch will cease to function.
Write it on the wall.
No, no. It is impossible to train that many effective lobbyists--
translation.de: Wir können nicht so viele Aktivisten trainieren…

translation.en: No, no, no. Do not kill an impulse before it's born.
translation.de: Würge den Impuls nicht ab, noch bevor er entstanden ist.

translation.en: What if they were constituents from their respective states
translation.de: Und wenn es Wähler aus ihren Staaten wären,

translation.en: who refused to leave until they've been heard?
-Now that's collaboration. -[all laugh]
-[Bayard] Write it on the wall. -Why can't you be collaborative like Norm?
translation.de: -An die Wand. -Warum bist du nicht so kollaborativ?

translation.en: -I… Shut up. -[chuckles]
-Somebody didn't go home last night. -Shut up. [chuckles]
Rachelle? How many bodies does it take to surround the White House?
translation.de: Wie viele Leute braucht man, um das Weiße Haus zu umzingeln?

translation.en: How many?
Sorry. I thought that was a setup for a joke.
translation.de: Ich dachte, das wäre ein Witz.

translation.en: -You literally want me to find out? -Yes!
Because on day two, we shall surround the White House…
translation.de: Denn am zweiten Tag umzingeln wir das Weiße Haus…

translation.en: Draw the White House on the board.
…while serenading the president.
♪ Ain't gonna let the president Turn me around ♪
translation.de: Ich lasse mich nicht Vom Präsidenten wegschicken

translation.en: Come on now.
♪ Turn me around ♪
♪ Turn me around ♪
♪ Ain't gonna let the president Turn me around ♪
translation.de: Ich lasse mich nicht Vom Präsidenten wegschicken

translation.en: -♪ I'm gonna-- ♪ -♪ Keep on walking ♪
♪ Keep on talking ♪
Come on now.
♪ Marching up to freedom land ♪
Well, what about sleeping arrangements? DC only has so many Negro hotels.
translation.de: Und die Übernachtung? Es gibt nicht viele Schwarze Hotels.

translation.en: How about tents? You know, like a--
translation.de: Wie wäre es mit Zelten? Wie…

translation.en: A sea of tents, big and bold enough to unify an entire movement.
translation.de: Wie ein Meer aus Zelten, groß genug, um eine ganze Bewegung zu vereinen.

translation.en: -Give me that thing. -[all laugh]
And near the Lincoln Memorial, a stage where the head
translation.de: Und eine Bühne in der Nähe des Lincoln Memorials,

translation.en: of every civil rights organization can be heard.
Why just the heads?
[Bayard] More! More!
We're not done yet.
You know there's a lot we can do.
-Get the signatures. We'll follow up-- -Yeah.
That's a really good start.
I think we need to organize this in a way that we all can…
translation.de: Wir müssen es so organisieren, dass wir…

translation.en: In '41, you called for a large-scale march
translation.de: 1941 riefen Sie zu einem Großprotest gegen Diskriminierung

translation.en: to protest discrimination in the defense industry but then canceled.
translation.de: in der Verteidigungsindustrie auf und sagten ihn ab.

translation.en: No, Roosevelt acquiesced to our demands.
As did Truman in '48.
Executive Order 9981,
the end of segregation in the armed forces.
translation.de: beendete die Rassentrennung in der Armee.

translation.en: -[spoon clinks] -The time has come for another.
translation.de: Es wird Zeit für den nächsten.

translation.en: -No, Bayard. -I can handle all the grunt work.
translation.de: Nein, Bayard. Ich mache die Laufarbeit.

translation.en: Building a grassroots operation, rally the young.
translation.de: Baue die Basis auf, motiviere die Jugend.

translation.en: But when it comes to the old guard…
translation.de: Aber wenn es um die alte Garde geht…

translation.en: -Roy. -Especially Roy.
…I'm considered a pariah.
translation.de: Für sie bin ich ein Paria.

translation.en: I need you.
Bayard, I can't.
If Lucille makes it to another summer--
translation.de: Falls Lucille es bis zum Sommer schafft…

translation.en: We honor her by doing the work we've always done.
translation.de: Wir ehren sie, wenn wir unsere Arbeit fortsetzen.

translation.en: The work the two of you did together.
translation.de: Die Arbeit, die Sie beide gemacht haben.

translation.en: No matter what Roy says or does, I need you to behave.
translation.de: Egal, was Roy sagt, Sie müssen sich benehmen.

translation.en: I do not have issues with Roy. It's Roy who has issues with me.
translation.de: Ich habe kein Problem mit Roy, er hat eines mit mir.

translation.en: But in deference to both you and the cause,
translation.de: Aus Respekt vor Ihnen und der Sache

translation.en: I'll sit in the corner and smile.
translation.de: werde ich lächelnd in der Ecke sitzen.

translation.en: After a day spent flooding the capital and encircling the White House
translation.de: Nachdem sie die Stadt überrannt und das Weiße Haus umzingelt haben,

translation.en: so that the president of the United States cannot get in or out of his own home,
translation.de: damit der Präsident sein eigenes Haus nicht mehr verlassen kann,

translation.en: our intrepid protesters would retire to tents
translation.de: ziehen sich unsere furchtlosen Demonstranten in Zelte zurück,

translation.en: which now cover the National Mall.
Chief, do you plan on pulling this together yourself?
translation.de: Und Sie wollen das selbst organisieren?

translation.en: We all know there's only one person who can organize an event of this scale.
translation.de: Wir wissen, es gibt nur einen, der so etwas organisieren kann.

translation.en: I was under the impression you were busy serving--
I mean, saving white people from the bomb.
translation.de: …Verzeihung, retten die Weißen vor der Bombe.

translation.en: -[scattered chuckling] -I go where needed.
Chief, if memory serves me, this is your third attempt.
translation.de: Chief, ist das nicht Ihr dritter Versuch?

translation.en: -He did not say "attempt." -Did you say something?
"Attempt" is hardly the word I'd use to describe the actions of a man
translation.de: Die Taten eines Mannes, der die Rassentrennung

translation.en: who is single-handedly responsible for integrating both the armed forces
translation.de: in der Armee und in der Verteidigungsindustrie beendete,

translation.en: and the defense industry.
-[man] Roy. -[Roy] Yes, Medgar.
Most of our folks in Mississippi
have never been outside of their hometowns,
so the opportunity to march with people from all over…
translation.de: Mit Menschen von überallher marschieren zu können…

translation.en: There it is.
…will afford them the chance to discover not only are they not alone…
translation.de: …gibt ihnen die Chance, zu sehen, dass sie nicht allein sind…

translation.en: He gets it.
…but are engaged in a struggle far greater than they ever dreamed.
translation.de: …sondern für eine unglaublich große Sache kämpfen.

translation.en: Thank you, Brother Evers.
Chief, what size crowd are you projecting? One hundred thousand people.
-[murmuring] -[man 2] It can't be done.
Mr. Wilkins, forgive me, but that's impractical.
translation.de: Mr. Wilkins, es ist nicht umsetzbar.

translation.en: Elias here's from Alabama, field organizer.
translation.de: Elias kommt aus Alabama, er ist ein Organisator vor Ort.

translation.en: Perhaps you have facts to substantiate your claims?
Previous DC demonstrations.
In 1913, 8,000 suffragettes,
in '26, 25,000 Ku Klux Klan,
and in 1932, 42,000 veterans marched and were attacked with tear gas and tanks.
translation.de: und 1932 42.000 Veteranen und wurden mit Tränengas und Panzern angegriffen.

translation.en: -[Roy] Who led the attack? -The military.
-And the race of the veterans? -White.
White boys.
Young man, your facts are correct. Your sense of history is not.
translation.de: Ihre Fakten sind korrekt, Ihr Geschichtsverständnis nicht.

translation.en: Those 42,000 men marched on Washington, DC because it was the Depression.
translation.de: Diese 42.000 Männer marschierten während der Depression.

translation.en: And after dutifully serving their country,
found themselves without jobs and homes and food to feed their family.
translation.de: und konnten plötzlich nicht mehr für ihre Familien sorgen.

translation.en: And when they took to the streets and were attacked,
the world did, in fact, bear witness.
Gandhi brought an empire down to its knees--
translation.de: Gandhi zwang ein Imperium in die Knie…

translation.en: Will someone please tell this man that this is not India?
translation.de: Sagt ihm jemand, dass wir nicht in Indien sind?

translation.en: For decades, the NAACP has been legally leading the charge,
translation.de: Die NAACP kämpft seit Jahrzehnten für Gesetze,

translation.en: and now you're proposing 100,000 Black folks invade Washington, DC.
translation.de: und Sie schlagen vor, 100.000 Schwarze auf Washington loszulassen.

translation.en: -Have you talked to Martin about this? -I lost his number. He lost mine.
translation.de: -Weiß Martin davon? -Ich verlor seine Nummer. Er meine.

translation.en: Well, Dr. King, who hasn't lost my number,
translation.de: Dr. King, der meine Nummer noch hat,

translation.en: has come to understand that mass lobbying is sheer madness.
translation.de: hat erkannt, dass Massenproteste irrsinnig sind.

translation.en: Brown v. Board is the crowning glory of this organization,
translation.de: Brown v. Board ist die Krönung der Arbeit dieser Organisation,

translation.en: yet all across the South, when Negro children sleep,
translation.de: und doch können Schwarze Kinder in diesem Land

translation.en: they see "whites only" signs instead of their dreams.
translation.de: nicht träumen, weil sie überall "Nur für Weiße" sehen.

translation.en: Counting on the courts to eradicate racial inequity,
that's madness!
Mr. Randolph, you are a giant amongst men,
translation.de: Mr. Randolph, Sie sind ein großer Mann,

translation.en: but when it comes to this,
the NAACP says no.
Now that Roy has made his position clear,
Dr. King's number, which you have allegedly lost?
translation.de: Dr. Kings Nummer, die Sie angeblich verloren haben?

translation.en: Go find it.
"When an individual is protesting
society's refusal to acknowledge his dignity,
translation.de: der Gesellschaft auf, seine Würde anzuerkennen,

translation.en: his act of protest confers dignity on him."
translation.de: verleiht dieses Aufbegehren selbst einem Würde."

Inspiration untethered from action loses all value.

-I did… -[zipper zips] -…just now. -[toilet flushes]

Looked like you was about to ask.
I was about to ask something, but it wasn't that.

translation.en: -I was warned. [chuckles] -[chuckles]
Well, whatever you wanna say, you just say it.

translation.en: -Doesn't everyone? -No.
No, most people are modest, cautious, afraid.

translation.en: So say it, whatever's on your mind this very second. No caution, no fear.
translation.de: Also sagen Sie, was Ihnen gerade durch den Kopf geht.

[inhales] You spoke, and my spirit soared.

Have you two met?
-Just now. -Earlier?

between the national and regional branches
before he takes over for my daddy's church.
translation.de: bis er Daddys Kirche übernehmen kann.

translation.en: Such a vocation holds great rewards both worldly and celestial.
translation.de: Eine solche Berufung hält weltliche und himmlische Belohnungen bereit.

translation.en: -A heavenly calling indeed. -[Bayard] Hm.

translation.de: Ich hoffe, Sie beide wiederzusehen. Samstag vielleicht.

translation.en: Understandably so, given the threats being leveled at he and his family.
translation.de: Verständlich, angesichts der Drohungen gegen ihn und seine Familie.

translation.de: Über Jesus Christus, Gandhi und Thoreau.

translation.en: So he trusted you.
I always told him what I knew to be true.
translation.de: Ich erzählte ihm immer nur die Wahrheit.

translation.de: aber sobald er die Kanzel betritt, weiß man, das Ende der Welt naht.

translation.de: Und ich empfinde das Gleiche für ihn.

your dream or hers?
Well, I've always wanted to serve the Lord.

translation.en: -And you were raised… -Quaker.
My parents… [chuckles]
Well, really, my grandparents raised me after their daughter,

So… the rumors about you and Dr. King…
translation.de: Also… Die Gerüchte über Sie und Dr. King…

translation.de: von Adam Clayton Powell, um einen Marsch zu verhindern.

translation.de: Ich erkannte Martins Bluff und kündigte.

translation.en: [chuckles] He accepted,
effectively ending my connection to the movement.
translation.de: und beendete damit meine Verbindung zu der Bewegung.

translation.de: Monate später wurde Reverend Powell Vorsitzender

translation.en: of the House Committee on Education and Labor.
You're okay…
in here…
at this hour.
That's drilled into you the day you're born, huh?
translation.de: Das wird dir gleich eingebläut, oder?

translation.en: They think you're less than, so you gotta be better than.
translation.de: Du bist ein Nichts, also musst du mehr sein.

translation.en: -Yes. -So be charming, be perfect, be polite.
The suffocating chains of Negro respectability.
When I told Ma Rustin I preferred dancing with boys instead of girls, she said,

translation.en: "What would you have me do with that?"
And then she said, "I suppose that's what you need to do."
translation.de: Und dann sagte sie: "Dann musst du es wohl tun."

translation.en: When Martin speaks, he holds nothing back.
translation.de: Wenn Martin spricht, hält er nicht zurück.

translation.en: That's what people feel when they hear him.
translation.de: Das spüren die Menschen, wenn sie ihn hören.

translation.en: Truth.
So tell me,
how can you preach salvation
and not wanna save yourself?
How can you speak of love
when your heart is disconnected from your flesh?
translation.de: wenn dein Herz und dein Körper uneins sind?

translation.en: And when Roy said,
"Elias, can you substantiate your claim?"
and you pulled out that piece of paper,
translation.de: und du das Papier rausgeholt hast,

translation.en: I hope you didn't think that I was go--
translation.de: hast du hoffentlich nicht gedacht, ich würde…

translation.en: [softly] Teach me how not to be afraid.
Good night.
[woman] Lord, no.
[man] Shame on Reverend King.
Sending those poor children to march the streets of Birmingham?
translation.de: Schickt die armen Kinder auf die Straßen von Birmingham?

translation.de: Ein Mann in Uniform lässt Hunde und Wasserschläuche auf Unschuldige los,

translation.de: und die ersten Worte aus Ihrem Mund

translation.en: are "shame on Reverend King"?
Bayard, there's no reason--
You see this and think, "Those poor Negroes down south,"

translation.de: denn sie entdeckten in sich einen Mut, dessen sie sich nicht bewusst waren."

translation.en: -A bravery you'll never know. -[colleague] Now, Bayard--
You sit behind that desk as you've sat for over 30 years,
translation.de: Sie sitzen seit 30 Jahren an diesem Tisch

translation.de: und denken doch nur an Ihre eigene Sicherheit und Überlegenheit.

Railing against Jim because of the color of his skin.
I'm not railing against Jim because of the color of his skin.

translation.en: I'm railing at Jim for being arrogant and ill-informed.
translation.de: Ich greife Jim an, weil er arrogant und schlecht informiert ist.

translation.en: The fact that he happens to be white while doing so, well,
translation.de: Dass er auch noch weiß ist, soll er

translation.en: that's between him and the Lord.
Every day, we agree to surrender that which makes us different

translation.en: so that together we might forge a more humane world.
translation.de: um eine menschlichere Welt zu schaffen.

translation.en: I can't surrender my differences. The world won't let me.

translation.en: Not today.
What are you doing? Where are you going?
Bayard, you must stay here where I can protect you
translation.de: Sie müssen hierbleiben, wo ich Sie vor der Welt

translation.en: from the world and from yourself.
You are a man of exceptional skills and of keen intellect,

translation.en: Not as a man and not as a person committed to saving the world.

translation.en: Innumerable times.
As a Quaker, I'd never seen anything like it.

translation.en: The hand-clapping, the singing, the shouting.

translation.en: It felt like…
exalted rage.
So instead of standing here and saying something I might regret,

I'm going to church.

translation.en: -[laughs] -Is that more your flavor?
I am drawn to beauty,
Black, white, indeterminate, so long as they're passionate and smart.

translation.en: -So why aren't you on a bus to Atlanta? -Because I do not care.

[softly] Ella, turn on the TV.
What? Okay.
…where legal remedies are not at hand.
Redress is sought in the streets, in demonstrations and protests,

translation.de: was zu Spannungen führt, Gewalt schürt und Leben gefährdet.

translation.de: Wir als Land und als Volk durchleben eine moralische Krise.

translation.en: To make a commitment it has not fully made in this century
translation.de: Er muss sich der Idee verpflichten,

translation.en: to the proposition that race has no place

translation.en: in American life or law.

translation.en: The Federal--
On your own, you and Martin are fine,

translation.en: but together, you are fire.
-Now, he needs you… -I can't.
…to help him figure out what's next, and you need him
translation.de: …für seine nächsten Schritte, und du ihn, um diesen Marsch zu nationalisieren.

translation.en: to nationalize this march.

translation.en: And don't you dare tell me about your damn job as an excuse.

translation.en: Good.
A shark trapped in a damn shot glass.

translation.en: but I do believe that he saw the power that you and Martin had,
translation.de: aber er erkannte die Macht, die du und Martin habt,

translation.en: and it threatened him.
Threatens 'em all.
But this… this country
has failed us over and over again.
translation.de: hat uns im Stich gelassen, immer und immer wieder.

translation.en: And even so, each day, we forgive by fighting to make things right.
translation.de: Aber wir vergeben ihm jeden Tag, indem wir für die gerechte Sache kämpfen.

translation.en: This new generation is restless and… and angry.

translation.en: You want that anger to turn to blood?
Our children's blood?

translation.en: You go.

translation.de: Und versöhne dich mit deinem Freund.

John R., WLAC soul center, Nashville, Tennessee,

translation.en: Don't touch that nigger.
Get on back now.
If I move, this child will never know that an injustice is taking place.

I'm not-- [straining]
-I'm-- [grunts] -[body thuds]
-Bayard. Oh my word! -Coretta.

-No, look at you. -Oh, you must stay for dinner.

I did it! Look, I did it!
-[girl] Shut up. -So, Madam Coloratura.

-♪ Let it shine, let it shine ♪ -[Bayard] Fortissimo! Which means loud!
-Bravo! -[clapping]
-Bravo, Uncle Bayard! -Yeah, Uncle Bayard!
So… Brother Medgar.
Unspeakable.
What did you make of Kennedy's speech?
translation.de: Was hältst du von Kennedys Rede?

translation.en: Calculated, cautious.
Hours later, Medgar gets shot.
So your march is… ambitious.
Unless we demonstrate strength in unity, Kennedy will do what they've always done,

translation.en: champion legislation that's destined to fail.

translation.de: die lebensverändernde Wirkung, die er entfalten könnte.

translation.en: -[laughing] -The dreams, the visions,
and unfulfilled aspirations of our ancestors--
First time we met… [laughs]
…I remember calling Corrie

translation.de: dass dieser Rustin ein wenig irre im Kopf ist.

that "a little" didn't even come close.
I missed you, friend.
And I you.
Come fall, the Dixiecrats will get to work gutting Kennedy's bill, which leaves us--

translation.en: Two months to organize the largest peaceful protest ever
translation.de: Zwei Monate, um den größten Marsch aller Zeiten zu organisieren.

translation.en: and absolutely no time for anything else.
translation.de: Und keine Zeit für etwas anderes.

Succumbing to blackmail, innuendo, and lies,
which are sure to follow if and when the march is announced.
translation.de: die sicher folgen werden, sobald der Marsch verkündet wird.

translation.en: What about things that are true about you?

translation.en: What you see, I cannot conceal.
But… I swear to you,
there will be no…
incidents.
So an epic demonstration in our nation's capital,

translation.en: organized in eight to ten weeks
translation.de: organisiert in acht bis zehn Wochen,

translation.en: without the help of the NAACP.
Sounds like a hell of a good time.
You once said,
"The time is always right
to do right."
We're calling for a nonviolent,
peaceful march on Washington.
Yes!
We intend to go there not by the hundreds or by the thousands,

[Elias] Now that Dr. King has publicly endorsed the march,

translation.en: So he's coming after you.
[man shouts] Brother Rustin!
-Cleve! What are you doing here? -[laughing]

translation.de: beschloss ich, moralischen und sonstigen Beistand zu leisten.

translation.en: meet the indomitable Cleve Robinson, union leader of District 65.
translation.de: das ist Cleve Robinson, Gewerkschaftsführer von Bezirk 65.

translation.en: And newly appointed chairman of the march's administrative committee.
translation.de: Und der neue Vorsitzende des Marsch-Verwaltungskomitees.

translation.en: And our first donor.
You'd think they've never seen proud Black men before.
translation.de: Als hätten sie noch nie einen stolzen Schwarzen gesehen.

translation.en: "Glorious shall be the battle when the time comes

Black gents, and Tom, shall we?
translation.de: Schwarze Herren, und Tom, wollen wir?

translation.en: -Bayard, if I might. -Do you understand--
[Martin decisively] Bayard!

that he intends to send a bill to Congress.
translation.de: dass er dem Kongress ein Gesetz vorlegen will.

translation.en: It is my personal estimation that in order to get the bill
translation.de: Es ist meine Einschätzung, dass, um es dort durchzubringen,

translation.en: past Southern segregationists will take a president of intelligence,
translation.de: dass, um es dort durchzubringen, es eines Präsidenten mit Verstand,

Kennedy has the first two in abundance but not the third.
translation.de: Von Leidenschaft hat Kennedy leider nicht genug.

So to ensure he does not relent,
we must not relent in our commitment to the country and to the race.
translation.de: dürfen wir bei unserem Einsatz für das Land und unsere Rasse nicht nachgeben.

translation.en: And that is the reason for the timely nature

translation.en: of this most improbable yet most essential endeavor.
translation.de: bei diesem unwahrscheinlichen und unerlässlichen Unterfangen.

translation.en: -I couldn't have said it better-- -Who are all these people?
You, you, you, you, stay.
translation.de: Sie, Sie, Sie und Sie bleiben.

translation.en: Everyone else, out.
I am chairman of the administrative committee
and, to date, the march's only donor.
Much appreciated. Out!
